scripts.start: reveal-md --theme night --highlightTheme hybrid --port 1337 --scripts custom.js --css styles.css README.md
scripts.build: reveal-md  --theme night --highlightTheme hybrid --scripts custom.js --css styles.css README.md --static dist
scripts.pdf: reveal-md  --theme night --highlightTheme hybrid --scripts custom.js --css styles.css README.md --print slides.pdf
